name: PIML in Metal AM
initializeCommand: docker-compose -f .devcontainer/docker-compose.yml build || echo 'If build fails, make sure Docker is running and properly configured'
postCreateCommand: pip install -e . && pip install -e '.[dev]' || echo 'Package installation with dev dependencies failed, continuing anyway' && (pre-commit install || echo 'Pre-commit hook installation failed, continuing anyway')
